snippet: In a meaningful departure from past policy, the Federal Reserve said it would focus on reducing unemployment at the risk of provoking higher inflation.
abstract: News analysis; Federal Reserve's decision to focus on reducing unemployment at the risk of provoking inflation marks the beginning of a new era for the organization, which has eschewed addressing jobs in the past; remarkable transformation is partly a response to the grim reality that more than 20 million Americans cannot find full-time jobs.
lead_paragraph: In a meaningful departure from past policy, the Federal Reserve said it would focus on reducing unemployment at the risk of provoking higher inflation.

headline.seo: In Tradeoff With Inflation, Fed Chooses Jobs
headline.main: Fed Responds to a Grim Reality
headline.print_headline: Fed Responds to a Grim Reality
